channel.title: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?

item.title: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?
item.dc:creator: @ownage-pkerzs ownage-pkerzs
item.description:
@ownage-pkerzs wrote:

I use this code and it works perfectly.

case ####: // Description here if(playerIsMember == 1) { sendMessage("your message here"); sendMessage("your mesage here"); sendMessage("your message here"); teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; } else { sendMessage("Message sent if player who isn't a member tries to use it"); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?

item.title: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

case 132: // Members Portal if (playerIsMember != 1) { sendMessage("You need to be a member to enter this portal!"); break; } teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("You teleport to the members area."); break;

Read full topic
item.source: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?

item.title: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

case 132: // memberportal
if (character-ismember = #) {
teleportToX = 3117;
teleportToY = 9842;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the members area.”);
break;
}

Read full topic

item.title: I have the portal, but how to make it member's only?
item.dc:creator: @megaxx megaxx
item.description:
@megaxx wrote:

Ok, so I already have the portal, but how do I make it members only?
This is the code:

case 132: // memberportal teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("You teleport to the members area."); break;

Thanks.
